content: solid fasten_off and pull remaining yarn tail into the body give each arm a final pull so that it curls back naturally stitches used chain=chain single_crochet=single_crochet double_crochet=double_crochet half_double_crochet=half_double_crochet st=stitch work 2 single_crochet together single_crochet decrease = insert hook into st and draw up a loop insert hook into next st and draw up a loop yarn over draw through all 3 loops on hook all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free 2020kristina k miller intended for individual home use only not to be reproduced or reknit for profit
